member.name: T:Hasso.Debugger.App.Lights.LightController
member.summary: api-controller for messing around with lights

member.name: M:Hasso.Debugger.App.Lights.LightController.Toggle(System.String)
member.summary: Toggles a light. Will create a new light on demand in adventure mode/>
member.returns: the current state of the light (true, false)

member.name: M:Hasso.Debugger.App.Lights.LightController.Off(System.String)
member.summary: Turns off a light. Will create a new light on demand in adventure mode/>
member.returns: the current state of the light (true, false)

member.name: M:Hasso.Debugger.App.Lights.LightController.On(System.String)
member.summary: Turns on a light. Will create a new light on demand in adventure mode/>
member.returns: the current state of the light (true, false)
